pages.text: Placed in $(l:resources/geodes)Geodes$(/l), automatically harvests fully grown Gemstone Clusters.$(br2)Normally all your other constructions and even crops do pretty much freeze in time when you are away, but this construct  seems to continue working even then. Weird.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: While it is not as efficient as breaking the clusters with a Pickaxe, the ease of use surely comes in handy.
